pageContext.claim: “It is in this vital national security interest of the United States to prevent and deter the spread and use of deadly chemical weapons. ”
pageContext.analysis: This is a flip flop. In more than a dozen tweets in 2013 and 2014, Trump consistently opposed U.S. military action and urged then-President Barack Obama against launching air attacks on Syria for allegedly deploying chemical weapons. Trump said the United States should focus on domestic issues instead.
